alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 21 at 2:48PM CST until February 21 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM CST WEDNESDAY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for low humidity, gusty winds, and dry fuels, which is in effect from noon to 7 PM CST Wednesday. * TIMING...Noon to 7 PM Tuesday and Wednesday. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * TEMPERATURES...72 to 78. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
